name: Southern Crossroads
description: A dusty intersection where the grass begins to fade into the scorched earth of the badlands.
image_prompt_positive: Crossroads, dusty, transition from grass to desert, signpost
narrative: Here, the vibrant green of the plains gives way to the unnatural grey and red of the Scorched Wastes. A weathered signpost points south to 'Heat and Ruin' and north to 'Safety'.
